pages.text: The $(5)Glow Module$() can be used in a $(l:mffs:machines/projector)Force Field Projector$() to illuminate the area around the field. Installing $(5)Glow Modules$() into a Projector makes the force field emit light. As more $(5)Glow Modules$() are added (up to a maximum of 64), the field's brightness increases - until it becomes equal to that of Glowstone.

pages.text: A Force Field Projector projecting a field with $(5)Glow Module$()s installed.
